headline: Vertex presents data from Phase I/II stage of trial for type 1 diabetes
summary: The safety profile of the therapy was found to be favourable, without any serious adverse events linked to the treatment.

raw.headline: Vertex presents data from Phase I/II stage of trial for type 1 diabetes
raw.summary: The safety profile of the therapy was found to be favourable, without any serious adverse events linked to the treatment.

headline: Vertex and Ono Pharmaceutical Announce Strategic Agreement to Develop and Commercialize Povetacicept in Japan and South Korea
summary: BOSTON & OSAKA, Japan, June 23, 2025--Vertex Pharmaceuticals Incorporated (Nasdaq: VRTX) and Ono Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. (OTCMKTS: OPHLY) today announced an exclusive collaboration and license agreement for the development and commercialization of Vertex’s povetacicept in Japan and South Korea. Povetacicept is a recombinant fusion protein therapeutic and dual antagonist of the BAFF (B cell activating factor) and APRIL (a proliferation inducing ligand) cytokines with best-in-class potential bein
